Package com.nitnelave.CreeperHeal.block

Interface Summary
Replaceable Interface for replaceable items (blocks, paintings).
 

Class Summary
BlockId A utility class to represent a block type along with optional data.
BlockManager Manager to gather block-related methods.
BurntBlockManager Manager to handle the burnt blocks.
CreeperBed Bed implementation of CreeperBlock.
CreeperBlock Represents a block that can be replaced.
CreeperBrick  
CreeperBurntBlock This class represents a burnt block.
CreeperChest InventoryHolder implementation of CreeperBlock.
CreeperComparator Comparator to sort Replaceable in an explosion.
CreeperDoor Door implementation of the CreeperBlock.
CreeperExplosion Represents an explosion, with the list of blocks destroyed, the time of the explosion, and the radius.
CreeperGrass  
CreeperHanging Represents a hanging, i.e.
CreeperHead Skull implementation of CreeperBlock, to store and replace the orientation, the owner, etc...
CreeperItemFrame ItemFrame implementation of the CreeperHanging.
CreeperMonsterSpawner MonsterSpawner implementation of CreeperBlock, to save the type of monster.
CreeperNoteBlock NoteBlock implementation of CreeperBlock, to hold the note.
CreeperPainting Painting implementation of the CreeperHanging.
CreeperPhysicsBlock Implementation of CreeperBlock for block affected by gravity.
CreeperPiston Piston implementation of CreeperBlock.
CreeperPlate  
CreeperRail Rail implementation of CreeperBlock.
CreeperSign Sign implementation of CreeperBlock.
CreeperSkull Skull (from the plugin PlayerHead) implementation of CreeperBlock.
ExplodedBlockManager Manager for the explosions list and the explosion index.
NeighborBlock Represents a possibly dependent neighbor block.
NeighborChest Represents the second part of a double chest, the first one being a CreeperChest.
ReplacementTimer Utility for all entities whose replacement is timed.
